description: This table contains the history of service line changes for accounts payable claim records.

columns.name: CLAIM_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the claim record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: TX_HX_PEND_CODES
columns.description: Stores the claim code history for each service line.

columns.name: TX_HX_TIME_SAVE_TM
columns.description: The time the record was saved.

columns.name: TX_HX_PROC_ID
columns.description: Transaction history procedure.

columns.name: TX_HX_PX_MODIFIER
columns.description: Historical modifier values for service lines.

columns.name: TX_HX_SVC_FROM_DT
columns.description: Transaction history service from date.

columns.name: TX_HX_SVC_TO_DT
columns.description: Transaction history service to date.

columns.name: TX_HX_PROC_HX
columns.description: The history of the procedure on previous versions of the service line.

columns.name: TX_HX_DX_CODES
columns.description: The history of diagnosis codes on previous versions of the service line.

columns.name: TX_HX_AMT_BILLED
columns.description: The history of the amount billed on previous versions of the service line.

columns.name: TX_HX_ALLOWED_AMT
columns.description: The history of the allowed amount on previous versions of the service line.

columns.name: TX_HX_PAT_AMT
columns.description: Patient portion of the bill.

columns.name: TX_HX_WITHHOLDINGS
columns.description: The history of the withheld amount on previous versions of the service line.

columns.name: TX_HX_DISCOUNTS
columns.description: The history of the discount amount on previous versions of the service line.

columns.name: TX_HX_NET_PAYABLE
columns.description: The history of the net payable amount on previous versions of the service line.

columns.name: TX_HX_NUM_ID
columns.description: Transaction history number in the claim procedure history.

columns.name: TX_HX_TX_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
AP claims transaction type (for procedure history).


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Charge


Payment


Adjustment


AP Claim Tx


AP Claim Refund Tx


AP Claim DRG Tx


Pharmacy Claim Tx

columns.name: TX_HX_MED_ID
columns.description: Transaction history medications.

columns.name: TX_HX_REV_CODE_ID
columns.description: Transaction history revenue code.

columns.name: TX_HX_MED_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Transaction history medication type.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Acute


Chronic


PAT

columns.name: TX_HX_SVC_START_TM
columns.description: Transaction history service start time.

columns.name: TX_HX_SVC_END_TIME
columns.description: Transaction history service end time.

columns.name: TX_HX_SVC_ELPSD_TM
columns.description: Transaction history service elapsed time.

columns.name: TX_HX_DRG_CODE_ID
columns.description: Diagnosis Related Group (DRG) code history item.

columns.name: TX_HX_DRG_CODE_ID_DRG_NAME
columns.description: The name of the Diagnoses Related Group name.

columns.name: PX_HX_EOB_COMMENT
columns.description: Claim procedure history Explanation of Benefits (EOB) comments.

columns.name: TX_HX_POS_TYPES_C_NAME
columns.description:
Claim procedure history place of service types.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

Office


Home

columns.name: TX_HX_TOS_C_NAME
columns.description:
Claim procedure history type of service.

 Category Entries: 


Medical Care


Surgery


Consultation


Diagnostic Radiology


Diagnostic Laboratory


Therapeutic Radiology


Anesthesia


Assistant at Surgery


Other Medical Items or Services


Whole Blood


Used Durable Medical Equipment (DME)

columns.name: TX_HX_PRIM_INS_AMT
columns.description: Insurance amount from primary for history.

columns.name: TX_HX_PRIM_PAT_PRT
columns.description: Patient portion from primary for history.

columns.name: PX_HX_OVRID_AMT_C
columns.description: Procedure history for override allowed amounts.

columns.name: PX_HX_OVRID_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
Reason the allowed amount was overridden.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: TX_HX_ALLW_CODES_C_NAME
columns.description:
Procedure history allowed codes.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Contracted Rate Payment


Payment as per Appeals Review Committee


Payment as per Duality Review Committee


Claim Denied


Procedure Denied


Secondary Claim Rate

columns.name: PROC_HX_PAT_CODE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Procedure history patient portion codes.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Co-ins


Copay


Not Covered


No Patient Payment

columns.name: TX_HX_CMPTD_WTHLD
columns.description: Computed withholding history.

columns.name: TX_HX_WTHLD_MTHD_C_NAME
columns.description:
Withhold method history.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Percentage of Net Insurance


Fixed Amount


Programming Point


None


Percentage of Allowed Amount

columns.name: TX_HX_WTHLD_RATE
columns.description: Withhold rate history.

columns.name: TX_HX_INS_AMT
columns.description: Net insurance amount history.

columns.name: TX_HX_NET_INS_AMT
columns.description: Net Insurance amount history

columns.name: TX_HX_COMPUTED_ADJ
columns.description: Computed adjustment history.

columns.name: TX_HX_ACTUAL_ADJ
columns.description: Actual adjustment history.

columns.name: TX_HX_ADJ_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description:
Adjustment reason history.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Procedure is capitated


Coordination of Benefits


Maintenance of Benefits


Allowed exceeds amount patient paid


Pay by DRG

columns.name: TX_HX_CODE_EDT_SAV
columns.description: Transaction history code edit savings.

columns.name: TX_HX_U_AND_C_AMT
columns.description: Usual and customary amount history.

columns.name: TX_HX_CONTRACT_AMT
columns.description: Contractual amount history.

columns.name: TX_HX_DISALOWED_AMT
columns.description: Disallowed amount history.

columns.name: TX_HX_NOT_COVERED
columns.description: Not covered history.

columns.name: TX_HX_DEDUCTIBLE
columns.description: The history of the deductible amount on previous versions of the service line.

columns.name: TX_HX_COPAY
columns.description: The history of the copay amount on previous versions of the service line.

columns.name: TX_HX_COINS
columns.description: Co-insurance history.

columns.name: TX_HX_PAT_TOTAL
columns.description: Patient total history.

columns.name: TX_HX_BFR_BEN_PEN
columns.description: History before benefit penalty.

columns.name: TX_HX_AFTR_BEN_PEN
columns.description: History after benefit penalty.

columns.name: TX_HX_EXCD_BEN_AMT
columns.description: Exceeded benefit amount history.

columns.name: TX_HX_OVRIDE_DIS_C_NAME
columns.description:
Override disallowed reason history.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: TX_HX_OVRD_DA_AMT
columns.description: Override disallowed amount history.

columns.name: TX_HX_OVRD_NC_AMT
columns.description: Override not covered amount history.

columns.name: TX_HX_OVRD_DEDUCT
columns.description: Override deductible history.

columns.name: TX_HX_OVRIDE_COINS
columns.description: Override co-insurance history.

columns.name: TX_HX_OVRIDE_COPAY
columns.description: Override copay history.

columns.name: TX_HX_OVRD_PTAMT_C_NAME
columns.description:
Override patient amount reason history.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: TX_HX_OVRD_PATPO
columns.description: Override patient portion history.

columns.name: TX_HX_COB_SAV_AMT
columns.description: Coordination of Benefits (COB) Saving amount history.

columns.name: TX_HX_OVRD_BEN_AMT
columns.description: Override exceeded benefit amount for transaction history.

columns.name: TX_HX_PRICE_ATTR_C_NAME
columns.description:
Pricing attribute for transaction history.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


PCP


SPECIALIST

columns.name: TX_HX_PAT_OUTOF_PC
columns.description: Patient out of pocket history.

columns.name: TX_HX_SAVED_DT
columns.description: The date the transaction history was saved.

columns.name: TX_HX_USER_ID
columns.description: Specifies the transaction history user.

columns.name: TX_HX_UBC_REVCOD_ID
columns.description: This column holds the transaction history for revenue codes in UB Claims. It stores the record ID (this is found in the revenue code master file; it is not the actual revenue code) for revenue codes that were previously entered on the claim.

columns.name: TX_HX_UBC_REVCOD_ID_REVENUE_CODE_NAME
columns.description: The name of the revenue code.

columns.name: TX_HX_REIMB_AMT
columns.description: Healthcare reimbursement amount history.

columns.name: TX_HX_OVRD_RIMB_AMT
columns.description: Override reimbursement amount history.

columns.name: TX_HX_SYS_ADJ_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
System adjustment reason history.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: TX_HX_ADJ_REASON_C_NAME

columns.name: TX_HX_AFT_BEN_PEN_OVRIDE
columns.description: Override after benefits penalty history.

columns.name: TX_HX_AFT_BEN_PEN_OVRIDE_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
Override after benefits penalty reason history. This should be translated using ZC_PEN_AFT_BEN_OVRIDE_RSN. 


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: TX_HX_COB_SAVINGS_PAYOUT
columns.description: COB savings payout history
